message: This proposal divides the money equally after accounting for the decrease in value over time. Please consider it.
I'm taking a risk here, but I think I can get a better deal. Let's split the money more evenly.  I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share now, hoping for a better outcome in the future.
I propose an equal division of the remaining funds, considering the decreasing value due to inflation. This ensures fairness and avoids any potential regrets later on.
